com.oracle.tools.runtime
Class PropertiesBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.oracle.tools.runtime.PropertiesBuilder

public class PropertiesBuilder
extends Object

A PropertiesBuilder defines a set of property definitions that when realized may be used as a traditional Map of name value pair properties.

Unlike traditional Map-based implementations of properties, a PropertiesBuilder provides the ability to specify an Iterator for named properties that will in turn be used to acquire actual property values when the said PropertiesBuilder is realized.

Copyright (c) 2011. All Rights Reserved. Oracle Corporation.
Oracle is a registered trademark of Oracle Corporation and/or its affiliates.

Author:
Brian Oliver

Constructor Detail

PropertiesBuilder

public PropertiesBuilder()
Constructs a PropertiesBuilder that will realize an empty PropertiesBuilder if no properties definitions are added.

PropertiesBuilder

public PropertiesBuilder(Map<String,String> properties)
Constructs a PropertiesBuilder with properties based on a Map of name-value pairs.

Note: The provided properties are added as default values to the PropertiesBuilder.

Parameters:
properties - the Map of properties to use as the basis for the PropertiesBuilder

PropertiesBuilder

public PropertiesBuilder(Properties properties)
Constructs a PropertiesBuilder based on a standard Properties representation.

Note: The provided properties are added as default values to the PropertiesBuilder.

Parameters:
properties - the Properties to use as the basis for the PropertiesBuilder

PropertiesBuilder

public PropertiesBuilder(PropertiesBuilder propertiesBuilder)
Constructs a PropertiesBuilder based on the properties defined in another PropertiesBuilder.

Parameters:
propertiesBuilder - the PropertiesBuilder on which to base the new PropertiesBuilder

public int size()

public PropertiesBuilder setProperty(String name,
                                     Iterator<?> iterator)
Sets the specified named property to use an Iterator to provide successive property values when the PropertiesBuilder is realized.

Parameters:
name - the name of the property
iterator - an Iterator that will provide successive property values for the property when the PropertiesBuilder is realized
Returns:
the PropertiesBuilder to which the property was added so that further chained method calls, like to other setProperty(...) methods on this class may be used.

containsProperty

public boolean containsProperty(String name)
Determines if the specified named property is defined by the PropertiesBuilder.

Parameters:
name - the name of the property
Returns:
true if the property is defined by the PropertiesBuilder, false otherwise

getProperty

public Object getProperty(String name)
Obtains the current value of the specified property. If the property has a value specified, that value will be used. If not the default value of the property will be used. If the property is not known, null will be returned.

Parameters:
name - the name of the property
Returns:
an Object

removeProperty

public void removeProperty(String name)
Removes the specified named property from the PropertiesBuilder, including its value and default value.

If the specified property is not contained by the PropertiesBuilder, nothing happens.

Parameters:
name - The name of the property to remove.

removePropertyValue

public void removePropertyValue(String name)
Removes the specified named property value from PropertiesBuilder.

If the specified property is not contained by the PropertiesBuilder, nothing happens. If the specified property is defined, only the value is removed. Its default value will remain defined.

Parameters:
name - The name of the property value to remove.

clear

public void clear()
Clears all of the currently defined properties from the PropertiesBuilder.

getPropertyNames

public Iterable<String> getPropertyNames()
Obtains an Iterable over the property names defined by the PropertiesBuilder.

Returns:
an Iterable

realize

public Properties realize(PropertiesBuilder overrides)
Creates a new Properties instance containing name, value pairs defined by the PropertiesBuilder.

If a property with in the PropertiesBuilder is defined as an Iterator, the next value from the said Iterator is used as a value for the property.

Parameters:
overrides - (optional may be null) a PropertiesBuilder specifying properties that will must be used to overrider those present in this PropertiesBuilder when realizing the Properties
Returns:
a new Properties instance as defined by the PropertiesBuilder

realize

public Properties realize()
Creates a new Properties instance containing name, value pairs defined by the PropertiesBuilder.

If a property with in the PropertiesBuilder is defined as an Iterator, the next value from the said Iterator is used as a value for the property.

Returns:
a new Properties instance as defined by the PropertiesBuilder

fromPropertiesFile

public static PropertiesBuilder fromPropertiesFile(String fileName)
                                            throws IOException
A helper to constructs a PropertiesBuilder based on the properties defined in the specified Java properties file.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file (including path if required) from which to load the properties
Returns:
a PropertiesBuilder
Throws:
IOException - should a problem occur while loading the properties

fromCurrentEnvironmentVariables

public static PropertiesBuilder fromCurrentEnvironmentVariables()
A helper to construct a PropertiesBuilder based on the operating system environment variables of the currently executing process.

Returns:
a PropertiesBuilder

fromCurrentSystemProperties

public static PropertiesBuilder fromCurrentSystemProperties()
A helper to constructs a PropertiesBuilder based on the system properties the currently executing process.

Returns:
a PropertiesBuilder
